sentences.sContent: Your brother left his bag of film on the ferryboat.I found it.
sentences.sContent_eng: Your brother left his bag of film on the ferryboat.I found it.
sentences.sCn: 你哥哥把这个装胶卷的提包忘在渡船上。 我看到了。

sentences.sContent: they came to a wide river and found the ferryboat was on the other side of the river. All of them had no idea.
sentences.sContent_eng: they came to a wide river and found the ferryboat was on the other side of the river. All of them had no idea.
sentences.sCn: 他们来到一条很宽的河边，发现渡船在河的另一头，所有人都不知怎么办好。

sentences.sContent: "Introduction to Buddhism" is composed of two seminar sessions recorded aboard Alan Watts's ferryboat home.
sentences.sContent_eng: "Introduction to Buddhism" is composed of two seminar sessions recorded aboard Alan Watts's ferryboat home.
sentences.sCn: “佛教概论”这个讲座是艾伦.瓦茨乘海船回国时于船上所录制课程，包括两个讲座。

words.tran: （乘渡船）渡过；用渡船运送；空运
